Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA VASCO DE QUIROGA, NO. 2000,COLONIA SANTA FE, MEXICO, 1210, Mexico

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Once the largest media company in the Spanish-speaking world, Grupo Televisa is now one of the leading telecommunication firms in Mexico. Televisa's cable arm, Izzi, is the one of the largest pay-television and broadband providers in Mexico. The firm also holds a majority stake in Sky Mexico, the country's only satellite TV provider. Televisa also owns interests in terrestrial radio, magazine publishing, Mexico bingo parlors, and three of Mexico's professional soccer teams. After merging its traditional media business into Univision, Televisa owns a 45% stake in combined entity TelevisaUnivision.
